item.title: EXTREME help needed :p
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

ok, well this is a report b.c NO ONE WILL ANSWER, so heres my problem, i NEED TO GET THESE DROPS RANDOMIZED, these drops are the replacements for what a players drops when he dies. herees the code

[code]for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) {
try {
if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 11999) {
replaceBarrows();
//server.checkPlayerCapes.checkDrop(this);
deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]);
}
} catch(Exception e) { }
}
try {

	} catch(Exception e) {}
		ItemHandler.addItem(526, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(995, absX, absY, 50000000, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(1079, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(1127, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(3753, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(4151, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(6585, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(4131, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(6524, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		ItemHandler.addItem(6568, absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);
		try {
	} catch(Exception e) {}
    if (itemKept1 > 0)
        addItem(itemKept1, 1);
    if (itemKept2 > 0)
        addItem(itemKept2, 1);
    if (itemKept3 > 0)
        addItem(itemKept3, 1);
    if (itemKept4 > 0)
        addItem(itemKept4, 1);
if (keep6570) {
    addItem(6570, 1);
    keep6570 = false;
}

		resetKeepItem();
		hitDiff = 0;	
		updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}[/code]

ANY help at all to get these drops randomized like runescapes pvp drop system would b greeatly appreciated.

ALSO i was jw if anyone knew the actually cords for the 100% actual king dags location like in rs.
